casebody.data:
2001-3107 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Alexander Hudon SMITH. No. 2001-KO-3107. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Smith, Alexander Hudon; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Natchitoches, 10th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 97-5450; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-144.

Denied.
